Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: '???', 3: '"And sometimes, the sleeping princess would dream."'}
{2: '???', 3: '"She would dream of the sunny courtyard, the gentle chirping of larks, the fragrant rose bushes, and her father and mother smiling warmly at her."'}
{2: '???', 3: '"In her dream, she met her beloved prince. They formed a family and lived happily together."'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory56.jpg'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: "What's next? What's next? Does the prince cut through the thorns and climb to the top of the tower? Does he save the princess?"}
{2: 'Mother', 3: 'Of course... "The prince finally climbs up the staircase to the very top of the tower..."'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: 'Yeah—!'}
{3: 'Mommy smiled. She turned the page of the book, and then continued to read the story in her usual gentle voice that I cherished so much.'}
{3: 'Daddy sat on the sofa with a glass of wine and listened to Mommy telling me the story.'}
{3: 'I may not be able to run freely like the other children, but as long as Mommy tells me adventure stories and fairy tales, I can still experience fantastic adventures.'}
{3: 'I miss these precious memories of my daily...'}
{3: '...By why do I "miss" it? It\'s not like Mommy and Daddy are gone.'}
{3: "But you see, they're right next to me. I'm sitting in Mommy's arms. She's telling me my favorite fairy tale."}
{3: '(Flutters)'}
{3: 'A rose petal fell onto the page.'}
{3: '(Flutters)'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'More and more rose petals fell as they appeared to be the dyeing the book red. My forehead began to feel cool and wet.'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: 'No... Is this...'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: 'Mommy...?'}
{3: 'I turned my head to Mommy, but her head just silently hung there.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryJianXue.prefab', 2: '1'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: 'Daddy! Daddy! Mommy...!'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryJianXue.prefab'}
{3: 'I screamed in panic and looked for my father on the sofa.'}
{3: 'But no one answered me. Daddy had already left.'}
{3: 'A strange "substance" appeared on the couch. It was black and red, just like burned—'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: 'Ahhhhhhhh!'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory69.jpg'}
{3: 'I suddenly sat up from my bed and gasped. My parents weren\'t by my side. This was Niflheim, the ARU\'s research lab. This was our supposed "care facility".'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: 'Just... just another nightmare.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Lia?! Are you okay?'}
{3: 'Someone grabbed my hand and questioned me eagerly.'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: "Yeah... I'm okay. Thank you, Anfia."}
{2: 'Anfia', 3: '...Was it another nightmare?'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: '...Yeah.'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: '...What happens if a princess has nightmares?'}
{2: 'Anfia', 3: 'What?'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: 'What happens if the princess in "Sleeping Beauty" has a nightmare, but she can\'t wake up?'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: "No one can wake her up, and no one can save her. She won't be able to wake up from her nightmare..."}
{3: 'That would be terrifying.'}
{2: 'Anfia', 3: "Wasn't she woken up by a prince? There's nothing to worry about."}
{2: 'Anfia', 3: 'Not to mention, you have me to wake you up from your nightmares.'}
{2: 'Anfia', 3: 'I may not be able to fill the room with roses like the prince...'}
{3: 'Anfia unclenched my hand and placed something in the palm of my hand.'}
{3: 'It was an origami rose.'}
{2: 'Anfia', 3: 'Would this rose... do?'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: 'Anfia...'}
{2: 'Anfia', 3: "You like this kind of flower, don't you?"}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: 'Yeah...'}
{2: 'Anfia', 3: "Oh, yeah. I heard that once I become a Construct, I'll have a chance to carry out missions outside the ARU. Maybe I'll see real roses then."}
{2: 'Anfia', 3: "I'll be sure to show you."}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: 'Okay!'}
{2: 'Anfia', 3: "It'll be my turn to be modified here in a few days. You'll be the first one to see me, Lia! I won't just leave a letter and rush out on a mission like Daniel."}
{2: 'Anfia', 3: 'Oh... The doctor is making his rounds! I gotta get going! See you tomorrow!'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: 'Ok! See you tomorrow, Fia.'}
{3: 'Anfia skillfully jumped out the window, then gave me an "OK" with her hand from below.'}
{3: "Hearing the doctor's periodic footsteps, Anfia quickly retracted her hand and left."}
{3: 'I looked towards the direction she left and smiled, then I shifted my gaze at the small origami rose in my hand.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Researcher', 3: 'Did she go out the window again?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The young doctor sighed helplessly, and examined me in her usual gentle manner.'}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: "You should be glad that I'm here today. Others wouldn't be so willing to keep your secret.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: "I still don't understand why you don't let patients in the care facility come in contact with each other..."}
{3: "The doctor's gentle eyes faded a moment, and she shook her head silently."}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: "Because it's the rules.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: '...Hm? Is this a rose?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: 'Yeah, Anfia made it.'}
{3: 'I handed the rose to the doctor, and she took it carefully.'}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: "It's beautiful... The last time I saw this kind of rose was when I got engaged.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: 'Huh...? You never mentioned that before.'}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: "There was no wedding, no ring. But a small origami rose did the trick. Aren't I something...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: 'Anyway, I already have my most precious "gift".', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The doctor subconsciously stroked her belly with a soft, gentle look.'}
{3: '—She looked at me the same way my mother did.'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: 'Do you mean...'}
{3: 'She nodded and held my hand.'}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: 'Do you want to name the child?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: 'May I...?'}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: 'Of course.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: "If she's a girl, how about—"}
{3: 'I thought a moment before coming up with that name.'}
{3: "If I had a daughter, I'd probably give her that name, but the doctor said that becoming a Construct means giving up my human body."}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: "'——'", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: "It's a beautiful name. Thank you, Lia.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'I felt warmth gradually spreading in my heart as I looked into the smiling glimmer of her eyes.'}
{3: 'I named you after my favorite flower.'}
{3: 'I hoped this child would be like the prince or knight in the fairy tale, overcoming pain and hardship to deliver a rose to the princess.'}
